subject: Re: [junit] random testing with JUnit
msgSnippet: On Sat, 18 Jun 2005 11:46:14 -0400, Elliotte Harold ... FWIW: you might be interested in the UK National Physical Laboratory s approach to random testing of
messageBody:
On Sat, 18 Jun 2005 11:46:14 -0400, Elliotte Harold
<elharo@...> wrote:

> Cedric Beust wrote:
>
>> I disagree. A lot of programs work based on random generations

FWIW: you might be interested in the UK National Physical Laboratory's
approach to random testing of sofware

www.npl.co.uk%2Fscientific_software%2Fpublications%2Fvalidation%2Frandom_testing.pdf

Thanks to all for the informative posts.

Jim
